Container.Name: dovi-convert
Container.Overview:
DoVi Convert provides a web interface for converting Dolby Vision Profile 7 MKV files (UHD Blu-ray rips) to Profile 8.1 for better compatibility with media players.
Many devices cannot process Dolby Vision Profile 7 files, including Apple TV 4K (Plex/Infuse), Nvidia Shield, and Zidoo players. This causes fallback to HDR10 or playback issues.
Features: - Web-based interface for easy operation - Jellyfin integration for library scanning - Scan directories for Dolby Vision files - Batch conversion with progress tracking - Safe mode with backup creation - Optional fast temp storage for HDD users - Backup restore functionality - Real-time progress and ETA
IMPORTANT: If using Jellyfin integration, the Movies/TV container paths MUST match the paths Jellyfin uses. Check your Jellyfin container path mappings.
TEMP STORAGE: Mount your cache/SSD to /temp_storage, then enable "Use Temp Storage" checkbox in the web UI. Needs 60-80GB free for 4K files.
Based on the dovi_convert script by cryptochrome.

Config.Name: Movies
Config.Description: Path to your Movies library. MUST match the container path used in Jellyfin (e.g., /movies)

Config.Name: TV Shows
Config.Description: Path to your TV Shows library. MUST match the container path used in Jellyfin (e.g., /tv)

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Path for persistent configuration and settings

Config.Name: Temp Storage
Config.Description: Fast storage (cache/SSD) for temp files. Mount this, then enable 'Use Temp Storage' checkbox in Settings. Needs 60-80GB free for 4K remuxes.
